summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Epic 5: Incentives Optimizer. All 27 backend API tests passed (100%). Frontend fully functional with all 3 tabs (Dashboard, Shipment Analysis, HS Code Checker), Money Left on Table hero card, incentive calculation, and per-shipment analysis table working correctly.

issues: Minor console warnings about chart dimensions (-1,-1) during initial render - charts render correctly once container has dimensions. Non-blocking.

seed_data_creation: 4 sample shipments with Moradabad HS codes (brass 74198030, copper 74181022, furniture 94032010, lamps 94055000) pre-created, total ₹32L exports with ₹85,250 potential incentives
context_for_next_testing_agent: Epic 5 Incentives Optimizer testing completed successfully. All 6 Moradabad HS codes (74198030, 74181022, 94032010, 94055000, 73269099, 68022190) tested and returning correct RoDTEP/Drawback rates. Frontend has 3 functional tabs. Calculate Incentive dialog working. Money Left on Table showing ~₹82,327 leakage.

backend_apis.rodtep_eligibility: ✓ All 6 Moradabad HS codes returning correct rates

backend_apis.shipment_analysis: ✓ Per-shipment breakdown with claimed vs potential

frontend_ui.dashboard_tab: ✓ Top shipments needing action table, scheme pie chart
